<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Generate Images"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/style-transfer/generate"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Generate styled product images using FLUX.2 Max.

Requires a completed style analysis (thread_id).
Uses the style_dna from analysis to guide image generation.

**ASYNC MODE:** Generation runs in background to prevent image loss on client disconnect.
Poll GET /status/\{thread_id\} for results. Check `generation_status` field.

Returns:
    GenerateResponse with status="generating" - poll /status for images
